title: Precomputed Tags：用預計算索引取代動態搜尋的標籤系統
titleEn: Precomputed Tags: Replacing Dynamic Search with Pre-computed Indexes
summary: 介紹 VibeBlog 使用的 Precomputed Tags 架構，如何用預計算的 JSON 索引取代傳統的動態搜尋，實現零運行時計算的高效能標籤系統。
summaryEn: Introducing the Precomputed Tags architecture used in VibeBlog, how to replace traditional dynamic search with pre-computed JSON indexes, achieving a high-performance tag system with zero runtime computation.
description: 深入解析預計算標籤架構的設計理念、實作方式，以及如何與 AI pipeline 完美整合。
descriptionEn: An in-depth analysis of the design philosophy, implementation approach, and seamless integration with AI pipeline for the precomputed tags architecture.
